Package ocsf

Class AdaptableServer

java.lang.Object
ocsf.AbstractServer
ocsf.AdaptableServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
class AdaptableServer extends AbstractServer
The AdaptableServer is an adapter class that extends the AbstractServer class in place of the AbstractObservableServer .

Project Name: OCSF (Object Client-Server Framework)

Version:
Febuary 2001
Author:
Dr. Robert Laganière

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private ObservableServer
    server
    The adapter used to simulate multiple class inheritance.
